name: ListenUp
0:
”Alexa, listen up”
”Alexa, open listen up”
”Alexa, start listen up”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: listen up
des: Have something to get off your chest? Concerned about an issue and want your voice to be heard? Got a comment to make about a movie or a sports event you're watching? Whatever is on your mind, Listen Up is here to help. It uses patented artificial intelligence to organize your comments with others on the same subject, and permits the subjects of those comments to hear what you say. All comments are completely anonymous; we do ask for your general location (city and country) so posts can be organized geographically. Let your voice be heard!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
